Package view

Interface StockView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockViewImpl
    public interface StockView
    This is the view interface for the Stocks application. This has various function descriptions to display the menu and values for the user on a text-based interface (console).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void askDate​(java.lang.String purpose)
      This function prints the message, asking the user for date for retrieving cost basis, total values and composition.
      void askMorePfName​(java.lang.String purpose)  
      void askPerformanceDate​(java.lang.String purpose)
      This function prints the message, asking the user for start and end dates to calculate portfolio performance.

      void getTSNameForDCA​(int i)  
      void marketClosed​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      This function prints the message if the market was closed for a particular date when used to retrieve total, cost basis.
      void modifyGetPfName()
      This function prints the message, asking the user for portfolio name to modify the portfolio.
      void modifyMoreStocks()
      This function prints the message, asking the user for more modification to stock values.
      void modifyPurchaseOrSell()
      This function prints the message asking the user for buying or selling stocks.
      void moreModifications()
      This function prints the message, asking the user for more modifications.
      void morePortfolios()
      This function prints the message, asking if the user has to update more portfolios on the text-based interface.
      void moreTickerSymbols()
      This function prints the message asking if the user has to update more ticker symbols on the text-based interface.
      void printCostBasis​(double pfTotal, java.lang.String pfName, java.time.LocalDate date)
      This function returns the cost basis for a given portfolio name.
      void printGraph​(java.lang.StringBuilder pfGraph, java.lang.String pfNameGraph, java.time.LocalDate date1, java.time.LocalDate date2)  
      void printMenu()
      This function prints the menu on the text based interface that has the options for creating flexible and inflexible portfolios.
      void printPfDetailsForComposition​(java.lang.String fullPfDetails)
      This function returns the composition for a given portfolio name.
      void printSubMenu1()
      This function prints the menu on the text based interface that has the options for flexible portfolios (total value, composition, cost basis, upload and retrieve).
      void printSubMenu2()
      This function prints the menu on the text based interface that has the options for inflexible portfolios (total value, composition, cost basis, upload and retrieve).
      void printTotalPf​(double pfTotal, java.lang.String pfName)
      This function returns the total shares for a given portfolio name.
      void successDCAPortfolios()  
      void successFileURL()
      This function prints the success message if file upload is successful.

        void printPfDetailsForComposition​(java.lang.String fullPfDetails)

        Parameters:

      • printTotalPf

        void printTotalPf​(double pfTotal,
                  java.lang.String pfName)
        This function returns the total shares for a given portfolio name.
        Parameters:
        pfTotal - (double) total value for the portfolio
        pfName - (String) name of the portfolio

      • printCostBasis

        void printCostBasis​(double pfTotal,
                    java.lang.String pfName,
                    java.time.LocalDate date)
        This function returns the cost basis for a given portfolio name.
        Parameters:
        pfTotal - (double) total value for the portfolio
        pfName - (String) name of the portfolio
        date - (LocalDate) date that is denoted in the LocalDate format
